我們需要保護野生生物及其棲息地。

The flowers began to wither in the heat.
花在炎熱中開始枯萎。

The villagers expressed their woe after the flood.
洪水過後，村民們表達了他們的悲哀。

A woodpecker was pecking at the tree.
一隻啄木鳥正在啄樹。

I attended a writing workshop last weekend.
我上週末參加了一個寫作研討會。

People go to church to worship on Sundays.
人們在星期天去教堂做禮拜。

Many people worship in church on Sundays.
許多人會在星期天到教堂做禮拜。

definition: adj. 值得花費時間(或金錢)的
example:
Studying for the exam was worthwhile because I got a good grade.
為了考試而學習是值得的，因為我取得了高分。

The museum is worthy of a visit.
這間博物館值得參觀。

She hung a beautiful wreath on her front door for Christmas.
她在聖誕節時，把一個漂亮的花圈掛在她的前門上。

He wrung the towel dry.
他把毛巾擰乾。

He wrung the towel to get the water out.
他擰毛巾把水擰乾。

They yachted across the bay.
他們乘遊艇橫越了海灣。

They sailed on a beautiful yacht.
他們在一艘漂亮的遊艇上航行。

My grandfather loves to yarn about his childhood.
我的祖父喜歡講述他的童年故事。

She bought a ball of yarn to knit a scarf.
她買了一球紗來編織圍巾。

Yeast is used to make bread rise.
酵母被用來使麵包發酵。

The apple tree yields fruit every autumn.
蘋果樹每年秋天都會結出果實。

The farm's yield of wheat was impressive this year.
這家農場今年的小麥產量令人印象深刻。

I do yoga every morning.
我每天早上都會做瑜珈。

Zinc is an essential mineral for human health.
鋅是人類健康必需的礦物質。

The bullet went by with a zip.
子彈嗖的一聲飛過。

definition: v. 以尖嘯聲行進;拉開拉鍊
example:
The car zipped down the road.
汽車沿著道路疾駛。

definition: v. 發出嗡嗡聲;將畫面推近或拉遠
example:
The photographer zoomed in on the bird to get a better picture.
攝影師將畫面拉近到鳥身上，以獲得更好的照片。

I heard a zoom as the camera focused on the bird.
我聽到相機對準鳥時發出的嗡嗡聲。
